name: MaskUP: A Novel Model to Detect Masks in Public Spaces
desc: Uses video surveillance camera footage to capture images of people who are not wearing masks.

name: TutorialRoach: A New Way to Discover Ideas
desc: Web app designed to encourage users to showcase their expertise. Uses Ethereum Smart contracts and CockroachDB systems.

name: myWaste: A Novel Way of Discovering Waste Production
desc: Encourages citizens to be mindful how much waste is produced in the neighbourhood to maintain eco-friendly neighbourhoods.

name: medChat: A Quick Way to Connect with Medical Assistance
desc: The app connects patients needing medical attention to professional nurses to receive quick treatment or remedies.

name: Portfolio Website
